docs.title: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon Guide
docs.text:
A community-driven repository for everything related to KubeCon + CloudNativeCon! 🎉 From swag tracking and booth details to travel guides, parties, and must-know tips.

Also, join certdirectory.io, a community platform where you can showcase your certifications and badges! 🎓🔥

docs.title: KubeCon Swag - China 2025
docs.text:
A list of all the swag given away at KubeCon - CloudNativeCon! 🎁🎉 Stay updated on the best stickers, T-shirts, socks, and other cool freebies from booths. Contributions welcome!

Exhibitor Name Stand Number/Location Swag

Also, join certdirectory.io, a community platform where you can showcase your certifications and badges! 🎓🔥
